name: Dead or Alive 6: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
With brand-new stages and action, DOA6 embodies and illustrates the evolution of true fighting entertainment!

Digital Deluxe Edition Bonuses
- Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus Costume - Kasumi
- Additional Character: Phase 4
- Deluxe Costume Set (25 costumes)
- Deluxe BGM Set (3 tracks)
